name: Couscous Dessert Bowl
description: This couscous dessert bowl with cinnamon plums and almond butter comes together in only 10 minutes. It also makes a great and comforting breakfast!
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups almond milk or other plant-based milk

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot,  combine the almond milk with the cinnamon and the agave and bring it to a boil.  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the couscous. Let it sit for about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pot,  combine the almond milk with the cinnamon and the agave and bring it to a boil.  Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the couscous. Let it sit for about 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, prepare the cinnamon plums. In a small pot combine the plums, the cinnamon, the water, and the agave and cook for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, prepare the cinnamon plums. In a small pot combine the plums, the cinnamon, the water, and the agave and cook for about 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the couscous is ready, fill it into bowls and serve with the almonds, the fruits, and the almond butter. Sprinkle with coconut flakes and some more cinnamon.
